text:
Lone Rooftop | Amsterdam, Netherlands | ONSITE, VISA SUPPORT

Lone Rooftop is a fast-growing startup from The Netherlands, creating insights on how office and educational buildings are being used, based on wifi signals and sensor data. Currently our system is live in 20M sqft, 40 buildings, 15 customers, 3 countries.

- Head of Technology: https://angel.co/lone-rooftop/jobs/281064-head-of-technology

- Senior Developer: https://angel.co/lone-rooftop/jobs/72115-senior-backend-deve...

- Senior Data Scientist: https://angel.co/lone-rooftop/jobs/72117-senior-data-scienti...
